root.name: Sudoku Student
root.description: Like most sudoku games Sudoku Student keeps track of your best times for completing all the sudoku puzzles and lets you make temporary number entries into each box. The game also gives you a title based on your performance in the puzzles and lets you select from easy, normal or hard difficulty when you play. Additionally, a character called the President of Nikoll will guide you through a number of in-game tutorials: Sudoku for Beginners Controls Solving Hints Temp Number Hints Handy Features
